sourcesContent:
<template>
    <add-form @createOrUpdate="createOrUpdate"></add-form>
</template>
<script>
import AdminAdd from '../components/AdminAdd.vue'
import { api } from '../helpers/Helpers.js'

export default {
    name: "admin-page",
    components: {
        'add-form':AdminAdd
    },
    methods:{
        createOrUpdate: async function(item){
            const res = await api.createItem(item);
            this.flashMessage.success('Item created successfully!', 'success');
            this.$router.push('/admon');
    }
    }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
</style>
